title: Virtual Real Estate Assistant - Remote
job_overview:
Real Estate Virtual Assistant (Remote – Philippines Only)

Hours: Approximately 30 hours/week
Pay: $5/hour
Location: Remote (Philippines only)
Start Date: ASAP
Language Requirement: Fluent English (spoken and written) – required

About the Role

We are a top-producing real estate team based in Chicago, affiliated Upgrade to see actual info | Christie’s International Real Estate. We are looking for a reliable, organized, and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our agents with administrative, communication, and transaction coordination tasks. You will be trained directly by our current assistant.

Key Responsibilities

    Communicate professionally via email and text with clients, attorneys, vendors, and real estate agents

    Coordinate property showings and inspections (scheduling often via text, email, or ShowingTime Plus)

    Prepare and manage documents using DocuSign

    Enter and update property listings and transactions in our MLS and CRM

    Organize and track deal progress from contract to close

    Assist in maintaining internal systems and databases

    Perform general administrative support and team coordination tasks

Required Skills and Qualifications

    Fluent English (written and spoken) – must be confident and professional in client-facing communication

    Prior experience as a virtual assistant (real estate background preferred but not required)

    Organized, detail-oriented, and responsive

    Tech-savvy with the ability to learn new systems quickly

    Consistent internet connection and a quiet remote work setup

Platforms You Will Use

    Follow Up Boss (CRM)

    DocuSign

    MLS systems

    Outlook

    Google Drive

Upgrade to see actual info

    ShowingTime Plus (one of several scheduling tools)

How to Apply

Please submit the following:

    Brief introduction

    Resume or OnlineJobs.ph profile

    Screenshot of internet speed

    List of tools and platforms you’ve used

    Availability (days/times per week)

Applicants must be based in the Philippines and fluent in English. We're seeking someone dependable, proactive, and eager to grow with our team. If that sounds like you, we look forward to your application.
